questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates entering a secretive country ruled by a powerful Shogun and an Emperor. What is...?
This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This technique, used by Zoro, involves the use of three swords at once, including one in the mouth. What is...?
This character, originally from Drum Island, is noted for his blue-nose and ability to shapeshift. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled cook and martial artist, known for his kicks and dream of finding the All Blue. Who is...?
